description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 10.
comments: n, 9*n+10, 81*n+100, 729*n+910, 6561*n+8200 and 59049*n+73810 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..19000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+10) and IsPrime(81*n+100) and IsPrime(729*n+910) and IsPrime(6561*n+8200) and IsPrime(59049*n+73810)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
